Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: James Meyers
Reviews.Content: this phone is really nice beside the borders around the screen being bigger n the screen being .2 smaller looks n works just like the original note 3 if you want this phone GET IT

Reviews.Title: lm;
Reviews.Author: sergio vargas
Reviews.Content: Phone is just awful and slow and freeze all the time had problems with it on day one phone would turn off and on by itself and then freeze nothing in the description about the phone is true its not 5.5 its not even unlocked and it is just plain terrible don't buy from this liar save your money on something better for real and i only had it for exactly 1 week  (((((Real comment))))  (((((Piece out))))).......
